title: To the slum dwellers located anywhere in the Corporation limit on lands belonging to Govt
clause_text: To the slum dwellers located anywhere in the Corporation limit on lands belonging to Govt. or Public Authority,

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
